step.label: Evolutility Wizard
step.intro:
In just a few easy steps you will create a web application component. No need to know ASPX, HTML, JavaScript, SQL, XML, CSS.

Just describe the application you want, and you will be able to use it right away.

step.label: Data Definition
step.intro:
Create a list of fields that will be tracked. In "Type of Data", choose the description that best match your data.

In the example of an AddressBook, the fields could be Firstname (text), Lastname (text), email (email)...

step.label: Data Definition Details
step.intro:
Enter the options for each field.

  • Required=Field cannot be empty.
  • Max Length=Maximum number of characters for the field (i.e. "50")
  • List of Values=List of possible values for the field (i.e. "Mr,Mrs,Miss")

step.label: Search Options
step.intro:
Specify the fields which are searchable and will be displayed in the list of results.

  • Search enables a "search by example"; data is matched against the user's input.
  • Advanced Search employs conditional search criteria.
  • List are the fields which are returned upon a sucessful search.

step.label: Panels Layout
step.intro: You can organize your fields into different panels (sections) on the page. Panels are placed sequentially, left to right, until a Width of 100% is reached. Once the maximum width is reached, the next panel will appear below the previous group of panels.

step.label: Fields Layout
step.intro: Assign fields to panels and set the width of each field.
